content.raw: First time I launched the sim (Run 1 button) it seems it didn't launch OK  (as you said) . I had to click Stop button  and then do again Run 1 button .  Do you know if this error behavior is something specific of this PR / AMI , or maybe this is something we should be aware of  and in alert in case it happens in production ?
content.html: First time I launched the sim (Run 1 button) it seems it didn't launch OK (as you said) . I had to click Stop button and then do again Run 1 button . Do you know if this error behavior is something specific of this PR / AMI , or maybe this is something we should be aware of and in alert in case it happens in production ?
